Emotions
  • Model Output Information
  • View page source

Model Output InformationÔÉÅ

This pipeline is used for evaluation. Plot and score are included in the Streamlit as an overall indicator of emotions predicted.

model_output_information.calculate_episode_confidence(scores: list[float]) → floatÔÉÅ

Calculate the overall confidence score for the episode by averaging the highest probabilities for each sentence.

Parameters: scores (List[float]): A list of the highest probabilities for each sentence in an episode.

Returns: float: The overall confidence score, calculated as the average of the highest probabilities across all sentences. Author - Panna Pfandler

model_output_information.plot_emotion_distribution(predicted_emotions: list[str]) → NoneÔÉÅ

Plot a pie chart of the overall emotion distribution based on a list of predicted emotions for each sentence in an episode.

Parameters: predicted_emotions (list of str): A list of predicted emotions for each sentence within an episode (e.g., [‚Äòhappiness‚Äô, ‚Äòsadness‚Äô, ‚Ä¶]).

Returns: None: The function plots a pie chart that illustrates the overall emotion distribution in the episode and does not return any value. Author - Panna Pfandler
